attributes.additional_details:
We the would like the British Government to not allow a 2nd referendum on leaving the EU.  The people have spoken and we live in a democracy.  A 2nd referendum would mean the end of democracy.
The British EU referendum was held on Thursday 23rd June 2016.  The vote was:-
100.0% Reporting
Votes
Remain a member of the European Union
48.1%
16,141,241
Leave the European 
51.9%
17,410,742

Leave won.  

The referendum has already caused major unrest.  Stop it now.
